name: Firefox:Autohide Navigation Bar revive
description: Automatically Hide Firefox navigation bar(which contains stuff like home button, backforward button, addressbar & searchbar). Show it up Floatingly above page content WITHOUT squeezing when mouse hover browser top area. Recovered & bugfixed from Firefox 4 - Autohide Navigation Bar Alternative Fx20 tested. Now it's fully support small Icon as well as Large Icon Mode. Enjoy it and if you could make donation for Mozilla中文社区, iwo will promise to keep on updating for the style as possible.
additional_info: Yes, it's now compatible with Large Icon mode! It has been fixed in current version@iwo!
